document_data.mainbody: '''Peace domain''' was a divine domain for [[cleric]]s of [[deities]] whose portfolio included tranquility, arbitration, and friendship. [[Cleric]]s who chose this domain were granted free access to these spellsâ€”they could cast them at any time without having to prepare them in advance.
document_data.Spells: Novice clerics of this domain could cast ''[[heroism]]'', ''[[sanctuary]]'', ''[[aid]]'', and ''[[warding bond]]''. Those of some experience were able to use the ''[[beacon of hope]]'', ''[[sending]]'', ''[[aura of purity]]'', and ''[[Otiluke's resilient sphere]]'' spells. Master clerics of the Peace domain were skilled enough to cast ''[[greater restoration]]'' and ''[[Rary's telepathic bond]]''. In addition, they were able to use ''[[balm of peace]]''.
